Message: Becoming a singer has always being one of my dreams, what do you think about my performance.

Your passion for music is evident, and I commend your effort in pursuing this dream. To further improve, we could focus on refining your breath control, enunciation, and exploring your emotional range during performances. Remember, practice makes perfect, so keep believing in yourself and striving for growth.
I hope to like my singing, I don't m=want to embarass myself on stage.

It's natural to have self-doubts, especially when stepping out of one's comfort zone. Believe in the progress you've made so far, and continue polishing your skills. With dedication, the confidence will follow, and the audience will appreciate your heartfelt performances.
I think my singing is horroble, But I want a honest opinion.

While I'm programmed to offer constructive feedback, I understand your desire for an unbiased assessment. Focusing solely on the technical aspects, there might be room for improvement in pitch consistency, tone quality, and perhaps expanding vocal range.
